title: I threw the game in Champ Select
body:
Our team was communicating really well, we knew what top and mid wanted to do so I, Jungle, was able to pick accordingly. And what we needed was an AD Tank/Bruiser. 

I decided to pick Rek'Sai.

We Lost.

I realized three minutes after the defeat screen.

Hecarim was unbanned

I have failed my team.

replies.body: I play a famous build called "ALLAHECARIM AKBAR" or "Shock Master Hecarim" if that first one triggers you. The strategy: Build full AP w/ move speed.
Ah yes.  The Shockmaster Hecarim.  Brought to you by the creator of Zero Damage Tryndamere.
